Job Manager: Create workflows:
Select template for workflow, and enter Name/Description. Click create
For each step of the workflow select a tool. Click select
Enter each input/output parameter. Click submit to enter each parameter
Click done when each parameter has been submitted
Once a tool has been selected for each step save the workflow. Click save workflow
The completed workflow has now been saved into you workspace.
Completed workflows can now be submitted to JES.
Job Monitor: Shows the status of any jobs which have been submitted to JES
